author: Staff Reporter
text:
Officials in-charge of enforcing the model code of conduct and monitoring cash movement in The Nilgiris district have thus far seized Rs. 22.80 lakh in cash.

According to a release, the officials in charge of the Udhagamandalam Assembly Constituency have seized Rs. 2.50,000 since the imposition of the code.

Officials in the Gudalur Assembly Constituency have seized Rs. 13.46 lakh and those in the Coonoor Assembly Constituency have seized Rs. 6.84 lakh.

The officials also said that they had seized the cash at Lovedale Junction, Thorapalli, Kil Nadukani and Kunjapanai check post.
title: Rs. 22 lakh seized in The Nilgiris
